Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price tailored just for you. Given its significant value to you at $12,000, I believe we can come to an agreement that respects both our interests. I propose to sell the product to you for $10,000. This offer not only ensures you acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate but also allows me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
